evaluation package¶

Submodules¶

evaluation.forecasting module¶

evaluation.forecasting.extract_exog_features(dataset, ex_features)¶
evaluation.forecasting.step_by_step_forecast(model, endog, horizon_length, exog=None, only_predicted_mean=False)¶

Out of sample (as in the model was not fitted on this data) one step at a time forecasts

Parameters

  • model – fitted statsmodel model e.g. SARIMAX

  • endog (pandas.Series) – endog values for the forecast period, expected to be after the period on which the model was fitted

  • exog (numpy.ndarray) – exog values for the forecast period, expected to be after the period on which the model was fitted

  • horizon_length (int) – length of the forecasting horizon

  • only_predicted_mean – statsmodels get_prediction method returns various other information regarding the forecast, setting this to True returns only the forecast value

Returns

Step by step forecast over the given endog and exog sets, returns array in shape (len(endog) - horizon_length, horizon_length)

ml-utils
